about_the_game: This game invites players into a light and pleasant flying adventure, where you play as a lively and adorable bird soaring freely along a broad roadside avenue. Using the ASDW keys to control the bird's left and right movements, players must skillfully avoid the uneven wooden fences on the road to ensure a smooth flight. The game's visuals are fresh and natural, with harmonious color schemes that offer a visually pleasing experience. The background music is cheerful and relaxed, creating a laid-back gaming atmosphere. Whenever the bird successfully dodges an obstacle, there is a crisp and pleasant sound effect, adding to the game's fun. Moreover, as the game progresses, the difficulty of the obstacles gradually increases, presenting more challenges to the players. This is a casual game suitable for all age groups, offering both relaxation and a chance to improve reaction speed and operational skills.

name: Acquaint

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
